units.title: Earth & Space Sciences — AC9S6U02 — Sun–Earth–planet relationships
units.whyThis: This activity introduces Earth & Space Sciences at a level that suits you.

units.title: Chemical Sciences — AC9S6U04 — Reversible vs irreversible changes

units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S5U01 — Adaptations for survival
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y5 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Marine Biologist
careers.whyThis: Marine Biologist will help you build your Biological Sciences and Earth & Space Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Marine Biologist you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Biological Sciences. Marine Biologist is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Marine Biologist now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: IT Support Specialist

To move towards IT Support Specialist you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. IT Support Specialist is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see IT Support Specialist now and understand what to work towards.

To move towards Network Administrator (Assoc) you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. Network Administrator (Assoc) is more of a future goal for you over the next few years. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Network Administrator (Assoc) now and understand what to work towards.
